quest.name: Money Makes the Moon Go Round
journal:
Managingway's gaze is fixed on the moon's economic prosperity.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the stockpiling Loporrit in the Carrotorium.
Deliver the requested items to Managingway.
objectives: Speak with the stockpiling Loporrit in the Carrotorium.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thanks to the Loporrit carats developed by Coiningway, the moon's economic influence is expanding in leaps and bounds.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: If we are to maintain this stellar growth, we need to produce more coins. As a counterfeiting countermeasure, however, the process is extremely involved.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: That being the case, we'd be grateful if you could lend your skills to the manufacturing effort. My stockpiling colleague in the Carrotorium will provide you with the materials you need.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04689
dialogue.text: You're helping us manufacture Loporrit carats? Wonderful, wonderful!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04689
dialogue.text: Using these materials, I want you to prepare the components needed to make a precision mold.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04689
dialogue.text: Using these materials, I want you to prepare the components needed to make polishing cloth.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04689
dialogue.text: Using these materials, I want you to prepare the components needed to make polishing agent.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04689
dialogue.text: Once you've finished, please deliver the items to Managingway. And if you run out of materials, I'll furnish you with more from my stockpile.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04689
dialogue.text: You want more materials? But you still have some─I can see it sticking out of your bag. I'm the one stockpiling here, not you.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04689
dialogue.text: You need more materials? But you still have some─I can see it sticking out of your bag. I'm the one stockpiling here, not you.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04689
dialogue.text: You need more materials? But you still have some─I can see it sticking out of your bag. I'm the one stockpiling here, not you.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04689
dialogue.text: You need more materials? But of course! I have plenty stockpiled precisely for this purpose.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04689
dialogue.text: You need more materials? But of course! I have plenty stockpiled precisely for this purpose.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04689
dialogue.text: You need more materials? But of course! I have plenty stockpiled precisely for this purpose.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: There you are. Do you perchance have some coin manufacturing components for me...?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Excellent, I will pass these on to Coiningway at once. Here is a Loporrit carat by way of thanks for your troubles.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...Hm? Judging by your expression, it seems you're not pleased by the choice of reward. But believe me when I say there's a perfectly sound economic reason for it.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: You see, a currency is only worth something if people have confidence in it, and confidence comes from widespread circulation. That's to say, your possessing the carats imbues them with value─value that you benefit from!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: But on the other side of the proverbial coin, excess circulation diminishes a currency's value. It's a fine balancing act, but rest assured I shall manage it with all meticulousness!
